sourcesContent:
{{ name }}

{{ product.description }}

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from 'src/app/products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'], }) export class ProductComponent { @Input() product!: Product; get name(): string { return this.product.name; } get linkTitle(): string { return `${this.name} details`; } fire(name: string) { alert(name); } onNotify(currentPrice: number) { alert( `Current price is ${currentPrice}, you will be notified when the product goes on sale` ); } }
